name: Lonely Walls (Backrooms Game)
description:
You weren’t careful enough to avoid no clipping into the Backrooms, the limbo between the real world and your dreams. A dimension full of danger where it’s only you, your camera, and your luck (you will need it). Lonely Walls aims to give your senses a feeling of desperation and fear while you traverse the monotone, weird and liminal levels from the Backrooms, collect the keys, remember the doors, and most importantly, avoid whatever is wandering out there. 

This is an amateur game created by: 

  • Fabricio Delgado Morales
  • Roy García Alvarado
  • Abiel Porras Garro

This game was inspired by The Backrooms creepypasta and Kane Pixel’s ideas.

The model used for the monster is "Bacteria - Backrooms (Actually pretty accurate)" (https://skfb.ly/oyOSt) by VHSvince, licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
